mapper.insert: INSERT INTO noticeboard ( nb_title, nb_content, writer, regdate, fixed ) VALUES ( COALESCE(#{nb_title},'제목을 입력해주세요.'), COALESCE(#{nb_content},'내용을 입력해주세요.'), COALESCE(#{writer},'익명'), (date_trunc('second', current_timestamp) AT TIME ZONE 'UTC'), COALESCE(#{fixed}, 100) )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM noticeboard ORDER BY CASE WHEN fixed = '200' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, nbno DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT nbno, nb_title, nb_content, writer, regDate, modDate FROM noticeboard WHERE fixed ='200';
SELECT nbno, nb_title, nb_content, writer, regDate, modDate FROM noticeboard WHERE fixed !='200' ORDER BY nbno DESC LIMIT #{LIMIT} OFFSET #{OFFSET};
SELECT nbno, fixed, nb_title, nb_content, writer, regDate, modDate FROM noticeboard WHERE nbno = #{nbno}
